Body:
in_dir = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', 'convert_2_magic', 'kly4s_magic')
program_ran, error_message = convert.kly4s('KLY4S_magic_example.dat',
    samp_con='4', dir_path=WD, input_dir_path=in_dir, data_model_num=2)
self.assertFalse(program_ran)
self.assertEqual(error_message,
    'option [4] must be in form 4-Z where Z is an integer')
